import React, { Component } from "react"; import Header from "./Header.js" import "../css/style.css" import data from '../data.json' class Webapp extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { feelings: [], boosts: [], activities: [], feeling: "", boost: "", activity: "", } } componentWillMount() { this.setState({ feelings: data.feelings, boosts: data.boosts, activities: data.activities, }) } setFeeling(name) { this.setState({ feeling: name }) } setActivity(name) { this.setState({ activity: name }) } render() { const feelings = this.state.feelings.map((item, key) =>
{item.frequency_range}
{item.title}
Shift from:

{item.shift_from}

Shift to:

{item.shift_to}

{item.feelings.map(feeling => ( ))}
); const boost = this.state.boosts.map((item, key) =>
{item.frequency}
Shift from:

{item.shift_from}

Shift to:

{item.shift_to}

) const activity = this.state.activities.map((item, key) => ); return (
I WANT TO FEEL
{this.state.feeling ? this.state.feeling : "Select Mood"}
Choose one:
{feelings}
AND BOOST MY
{this.state.boost ? this.state.activity : "Select Mood"}
Choose one:
WHILE I
{this.state.activity ? this.state.activity : "Select Mood"}
Choose one:
{activity}
test height
) } } export default Webapp;
